:root { --trans-light: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.88); --trans-dark: rgba(25, 25, 25, 0.88); --border-style: 1px solid rgb(169, 169, 169); --backdrop-filter: blur(5px) saturate(150%);}/* é¡µè„šä¸å¤´å›¾é€æ˜åŒ– */#footer { background: transparent !important;}#page-header { background: transparent !important;}/* ç™½å¤©æ¨¡å¼é®ç½©é€æ˜ *//* #footer::before { background: transparent !important;}#page-header::before { background: transparent !important;} *//* å¤œé—´æ¨¡å¼é®ç½©é€æ˜ *//* [data-theme="dark"] #footer::before { background: transparent !important;}[data-theme="dark"] #page-header::before { background: transparent !important;} *//* é¼ æ ‡æ ·å¼ */#cursor { position: fixed; width: 16px; height: 16px; /* è¿™é‡Œæ”¹å˜è·Ÿéšçš„åº•è‰² */ background: rgb(100, 149, 237); border-radius: 8px; opacity: 0.25; z-index: 10086; pointer-events: none; transition: 0.2s ease-in-out; transition-property: background, opacity, transform;}#cursor.hidden { opacity: 0;}#cursor.hover { opacity: 0.1; transform: scale(2.5); -webkit-transform: scale(2.5); -moz-transform: scale(2.5); -ms-transform: scale(2.5); -o-transform: scale(2.5);}#cursor.active { opacity: 0.5; transform: scale(0.5); -webkit-transform: scale(0.5); -moz-transform: scale(0.5); -ms-transform: scale(0.5); -o-transform: scale(0.5);}/* é¦–é¡µæ–‡ç« å¡ç‰‡ */#recent-posts .recent-post-item { background: var(--trans-light); backdrop-filter: var(--backdrop-filter); border-radius: 25px; border: var(--border-style);}/* é¦–é¡µä¾§æ å¡ç‰‡ */#aside-content .card-widget { background: var(--trans-light); backdrop-filter: var(--backdrop-filter); border-radius: 18px; border: var(--border-style);}/* æ–‡ç« é¡µã€å½’æ¡£é¡µã€æ™®é€šé¡µé¢ */div#post,div#page,div#archive { background: var(--trans-light); animation: ccc 4s linear infinite;}/* æ§åˆ¶é£è½¦è½¬åŠ¨æ–¹å‘ -1turn ä¸ºé€†æ—¶é’ˆè½¬åŠ¨ï¼Œ1turn ä¸ºé¡ºæ—¶é’ˆè½¬åŠ¨ï¼Œç›¸åŒæ•°å­—éƒ¨åˆ†è®°å¾—ç»Ÿä¸€ä¿®æ”¹ */@-webkit-keyframes ccc { 0% { -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg); transform: rotate(0deg); } to { -webkit-transform: rotate(-1turn); transform: rotate(-1turn); }}@keyframes ccc { 0% { -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg); transform: rotate(0deg); } to { -webkit-transform: rotate(-1turn); transform: rotate(-1turn); }}/* è®¾ç½®é£è½¦é¢œè‰² */#content-inner.layout h1::before { color: #ef50a8; margin-left: -1.55rem; font-size: 1.3rem; margin-top: -0.23rem;}#content-inner.layout h2::before { color: #fb7061; margin-left: -1.35rem; font-size: 1.1rem; margin-top: -0.12rem;}#content-inner.layout h3::before { color: #ffbf00; margin-left: -1.22rem; font-size: 0.95rem; margin-top: -0.09rem;}#content-inner.layout h4::before { color: #a9e000; margin-left: -0.9rem; font-size: 0.66rem; margin-top: 0rem; }/* è®¾ç½®é£è½¦hoveråŠ¨æ•ˆ 6sé‚£é‡Œå¯ä»¥è‡ªå·±è°ƒèŠ‚å¿«æ…¢*/#content-inner.layout h1:hover,#content-inner.layout h2:hover,#content-inner.layout h3:hover,#content-inner.layout h4:hover,#content-inner.layout h5:hover,#content-inner.layout h6:hover { color: var(--theme-color);}#content-inner.layout h1:hover::before,#content-inner.layout h2:hover::before,#content-inner.layout h3:hover::before,#content-inner.layout h4:hover::before,#content-inner.layout h5:hover::before,#content-inner.layout h6:hover::before { color: var(--theme-color); transform: translateX(-50%) !important;}/* å­èœå•æ¨ªå‘å±•ç¤º */#nav .menus_items .menus_item:hover .menus_item_child { display: flex !important;}/* è¿™é‡Œçš„2æ˜¯ä»£è¡¨å¯¼èˆªæ çš„ç¬¬2ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼Œå³æœ‰å­èœå•çš„å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æŒ‰è‡ªå·±éœ€æ±‚ä¿®æ”¹ *//* .menus_items .menus_item:nth-child(2) .menus_item_child { left: -125px;} *//* ç§»åŠ¨ç«¯éšè—å¯¼èˆª/èœå•çš„ç¤¾äº¤ï¼Œä¸å½±å“ä¾§æ ä¸ªäººå¡ç‰‡ */@media (max-width: 768px) { #nav .social-icon, #page-header .social-icon, .menu-social { display: none !important; }}/* æ¬¢è¿ä¿¡æ¯ */#welcome-info { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #b9f4f3, #e3fbf9); border-radius: 18px; padding: 8px;}[data-theme="dark"] #welcome-info { background: #212121;}/* å¤´åƒçŠ¶æ€ */.card-info-avatar .author-status-box { position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: calc(100% - 28px); width: 28px; height: 28px; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 2em; background-color: #f8f8f8; transition: 0.4s; overflow: hidden;}[data-theme="dark"] .card-info-avatar .author-status-box { background-color: #222222; border: 1px solid #5c6060;}.card-info-avatar .author-status { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: flex-start; /* é å·¦æ’åˆ—ï¼Œé¿å…åå³ */ height: 28px; padding: 0 6px; gap: 4px;}.card-info-avatar .author-status span:nth-child(1) { width: 16px; /* emoji å§‹ç»ˆå ä½æ˜¾ç¤º */ flex: 0 0 16px; text-align: center; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1; transform: translate(-3px, -2px); /* å‘å·¦ä¸Šå¾®è°ƒ */}.card-info-avatar .author-status span:nth-child(2) { width: 0; /* æ”¶èµ·æ—¶éšè—æ–‡å­— */ flex: 1 1 auto; font-size: 12px; height: 100%; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; transition: 0.4s;}.card-info-avatar .author-status-box:hover { width: 110px; position: relative;}

function share_() { let url = window.location.origin + window.location.pathname; try { // æˆªå–æ ‡é¢˜ var title = document.title; var subTitle = title.endsWith("| Bernon's Blog") ? title.substring(0, title.length - 14) : title; var shareText = 'Bernon's Blogçš„ç«™å†…åˆ†äº«
æ ‡é¢˜ï¼š' + subTitle + '
é“¾æ¥ï¼š' + url + '
æ¬¢è¿æ¥è®¿ï¼ğŸ­ğŸ­ğŸ­'; navigator.clipboard.writeText(shareText).then(() => { // ä½¿ç”¨ Hexo å†…ç½® snackbar é€šçŸ¥ if (typeof btf !== 'undefined' && btf.snackbarShow) { btf.snackbarShow("æˆåŠŸå¤åˆ¶åˆ†äº«ä¿¡æ¯ğŸ‰"); } else { alert("æˆåŠŸå¤åˆ¶åˆ†äº«ä¿¡æ¯ğŸ‰"); } }).catch(err => { console.error('å¤åˆ¶å¤±è´¥ï¼', err); }); } catch (err) { console.error('åˆ†äº«å¤±è´¥ï¼', err); }}// é˜²æŠ–å‡½æ•°function debounce(func, wait) { let timeout; return function executedFunction(...args) { const later = () => { clearTimeout(timeout); func(...args); }; clearTimeout(timeout); timeout = setTimeout(later, wait); };}// æ‰§è¡Œé˜²æŠ–åˆ†äº«const share = debounce(share_, 300);

var CURSOR;Math.lerp = (a, b, n) => (1 - n) * a + n * b;const getStyle = (el, attr) => { try { return window.getComputedStyle ? window.getComputedStyle(el)[attr] : el.currentStyle[attr]; } catch (e) {} return "";};class Cursor { constructor() { this.pos = {curr: null, prev: null}; this.pt = []; this.create(); this.init(); this.render(); } move(left, top) { this.cursor.style["left"] = `${left}px`; this.cursor.style["top"] = `${top}px`; } create() { if (!this.cursor) { this.cursor = document.createElement("div"); this.cursor.id = "cursor"; this.cursor.classList.add("hidden"); document.body.append(this.cursor); } var el = document.getElementsByTagName('*'); for (let i = 0; i < el.length; i++) if (getStyle(el[i], "cursor") == "pointer") this.pt.push(el[i].outerHTML); document.body.appendChild((this.scr = document.createElement("style"))); // è¿™é‡Œæ”¹å˜é¼ æ ‡æŒ‡é’ˆçš„é¢œè‰² ç”±svgç”Ÿæˆ this.scr.innerHTML = `* {cursor: url("data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 8 8' width='8px' height='8px'><circle cx='4' cy='4' r='4' opacity='1.0' fill='rgb(100, 149, 237)'/></svg>") 4 4, auto}`; } refresh() { this.scr.remove(); this.cursor.classList.remove("hover"); this.cursor.classList.remove("active"); this.pos = {curr: null, prev: null}; this.pt = []; this.create(); this.init(); this.render(); } init() { document.onmouseover = e => this.pt.includes(e.target.outerHTML) && this.cursor.classList.add("hover"); document.onmouseout = e => this.pt.includes(e.target.outerHTML) && this.cursor.classList.remove("hover"); document.onmousemove = e => {(this.pos.curr == null) && this.move(e.clientX - 8, e.clientY - 8); this.pos.curr = {x: e.clientX - 8, y: e.clientY - 8}; this.cursor.classList.remove("hidden");}; document.onmouseenter = e => this.cursor.classList.remove("hidden"); document.onmouseleave = e => this.cursor.classList.add("hidden"); document.onmousedown = e => this.cursor.classList.add("active"); document.onmouseup = e => this.cursor.classList.remove("active"); } render() { if (this.pos.prev) { this.pos.prev.x = Math.lerp(this.pos.prev.x, this.pos.curr.x, 0.15); this.pos.prev.y = Math.lerp(this.pos.prev.y, this.pos.curr.y, 0.15); this.move(this.pos.prev.x, this.pos.prev.y); } else { this.pos.prev = this.pos.curr; } requestAnimationFrame(() => this.render()); }}(() => { CURSOR = new Cursor(); // éœ€è¦é‡æ–°è·å–åˆ—è¡¨æ—¶ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ CURSOR.refresh()})();

// 1. å£°æ˜å…¨å±€å˜é‡ï¼Œå­˜å‚¨IPå®šä½ç»“æœï¼Œé¿å…æœªå®šä¹‰æŠ¥é”™let ipLocation = null;// 2. è…¾è®¯åœ°å›¾IPå®šä½getè¯·æ±‚ï¼ˆå¼‚æ­¥ï¼‰// https://lbs.qq.com/$.ajax({ type: 'get', url: 'https://apis.map.qq.com/ws/location/v1/ip', dataType: 'jsonp', jsonp: 'callback', data: { key: 'UKZBZ-6PILQ-36Y5P-2XIUJ-T5WZ6-Q7BSD', output: 'jsonp' }, success: function (res) { console.log('IPå®šä½æˆåŠŸ:', res); if (res.status === 0) { ipLocation = res; showWelcome(); // æˆåŠŸåç«‹å³æ˜¾ç¤ºæ¬¢è¿ä¿¡æ¯ } else { console.error('IPå®šä½å¤±è´¥:', res.message); } }, error: function(xhr, status, error) { console.error('è¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥:', error); }})function getDistance(e1, n1, e2, n2) { const R = 6371 const { sin, cos, asin, PI, hypot } = Math let getPoint = (e, n) => { e *= PI / 180 n *= PI / 180 return { x: cos(n) * cos(e), y: cos(n) * sin(e), z: sin(n) } } let a = getPoint(e1, n1) let b = getPoint(e2, n2) let c = hypot(a.x - b.x, a.y - b.y, a.z - b.z) let r = asin(c / 2) * 2 * R return Math.round(r);}function showWelcome() { let dist = getDistance(103.687000, 36.113000, ipLocation.result.location.lng, ipLocation.result.location.lat); let pos = ipLocation.result.ad_info.nation; let ip; let posdesc; //æ ¹æ®å›½å®¶ã€çœä»½ã€åŸå¸‚ä¿¡æ¯è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ¬¢è¿è¯­ switch (ipLocation.result.ad_info.nation) { case "ç¾å›½": posdesc = "The road keeps going."; break; case "è‹±å›½": posdesc = "Tea is ready, take your time."; break; case "ä¿„ç½—æ–¯": posdesc = "Ğ¡Ğ½ĞµĞ³ ĞµÑ‰Ñ‘ Ğ½Ğµ Ñ€Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğ°ÑĞ»."; break; case "æ³•å›½": posdesc = "Le temps ralentit sous la lumiÃ¨re du soir."; break; case "å¾·å›½": posdesc = "Die Zeit verging im Fluge."; break; case "æ„å¤§åˆ©": posdesc = "Il sole cade sulle pietre antiche."; break; case "æ¾³å¤§åˆ©äºš": posdesc = "The ocean is calling."; break; case "åŠ æ‹¿å¤§": posdesc = "Une feuille dâ€™Ã©rable est tombÃ©e."; break; case "è¥¿ç­ç‰™": posdesc = "La noche apenas comienza."; break; case "æ—¥æœ¬": posdesc = "é¢¨éˆ´ãŒã€ãã£ã¨é³´ã£ãŸ"; break; case "éŸ©å›½": posdesc = "ë°”ëŒì´ ë§Œë‚˜ê³  ì‚°í•´ë¥¼ ê±´ë„ˆ, ë°˜ê°‘ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!"; break; case "ä¸­å›½": pos = ipLocation.result.ad_info.province + " " + ipLocation.result.ad_info.city + " " + ipLocation.result.ad_info.district; ip = ipLocation.result.ip; switch (ipLocation.result.ad_info.province) { case "åŒ—äº¬å¸‚": posdesc = "é’Ÿå£°æœªè¿œï¼Œæ•…äº‹ä»åœ¨ç»§ç»­ã€‚"; break; case "ä¸Šæµ·å¸‚": posdesc = "ç¯è¿˜äº®ç€ï¼Œå¤œè‰²æ­£å¥½ã€‚"; break; case "å¤©æ´¥å¸‚": posdesc = "æµ·é£æ‹‚è¿‡ï¼ŒèŒ¶é¦™æœªæ•£ã€‚"; break; case "é‡åº†å¸‚": posdesc = "é›¾èµ·å±±åŸï¼Œè·¯å‘ä¸Šç”Ÿé•¿ã€‚"; break; case "æ²³åŒ—çœ": posdesc = "å±±åŠ¿å·å·æˆå£å’ï¼Œå¤©ä¸‹é›„å…³ã€‚é“é©¬é‡‘æˆˆç”±æ­¤å‘ï¼Œæ— é™æ±Ÿå±±ã€‚"; break; case "å±±è¥¿çœ": posdesc = "çª‘ç«ä¸ç­ï¼Œå¤œè‰²å¾ˆæ·±ã€‚"; break; case "è¾½å®çœ": posdesc = "æµ·å¾ˆè¿‘ï¼Œå·¥ä¸šå¾ˆé‡ã€‚"; break; case "å‰æ—çœ": posdesc = "æ—æ·±é›ªåšï¼Œå¤œå¾ˆå®‰é™ã€‚"; break; case "é»‘é¾™æ±Ÿçœ": posdesc = "é›ªè½æ— å£°ï¼Œç¯å´å¾ˆæš–ã€‚"; break; case "æ±Ÿè‹çœ": posdesc = "æ°´æ…¢æ…¢æµï¼Œè¯ä¹Ÿæ…¢æ…¢è¯´ã€‚"; break; case "æµ™æ±Ÿçœ": posdesc = "ä¸œé£æ¸ç»¿è¥¿æ¹–æŸ³ï¼Œé›å·²è¿˜äººæœªå—å½’ã€‚"; break; case "å®‰å¾½çœ": posdesc = "å±±å½±å…¥å¢¨ï¼Œå¤©è‰²å¾®æ·¡ã€‚"; break; case "ç¦å»ºçœ": posdesc = "äº•é‚‘ç™½äº‘é—´ï¼Œå²©åŸè¿œå¸¦å±±ã€‚"; break; case "æ±Ÿè¥¿çœ": posdesc = "è½éœä¸å­¤é¹œé½é£ï¼Œç§‹æ°´å…±é•¿å¤©ä¸€è‰²ã€‚"; break; case "å±±ä¸œçœ": posdesc = "é£ä»æµ·æ¥ï¼Œäººè®²åˆ†é‡ã€‚"; break; case "æ²³å—çœ": posdesc = "é»„æ²³è¿œä¸Šç™½äº‘é—´ï¼Œä¸€ç‰‡å­¤åŸä¸‡ä»å±±ã€‚"; break; case "æ¹–åŒ—çœ": posdesc = "æ°´é¢å¼€é˜”ï¼Œå¤©è‰²ç¿»æ¶Œã€‚"; break; case "æ¹–å—çœ": posdesc = "å±±ä¸è¯´è¯ï¼Œç«å´å¾ˆæ—ºã€‚"; break; case "å¹¿ä¸œçœ": posdesc = "æ—©èŒ¶æœªå‡‰ï¼Œç”Ÿæ´»æ­£å¿™ã€‚"; break; case "æµ·å—çœ": posdesc = "æœè§‚æ—¥å‡ºé€ç™½æµªï¼Œå¤•çœ‹äº‘èµ·æ”¶éœå…‰ã€‚"; break; case "å››å·çœ": posdesc = "äº‘ä½ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œæ—¥å­å˜è½¯ã€‚"; break; case "è´µå·çœ": posdesc = "é›¾æ•£å¾—æ…¢ï¼Œé…’å´å¾ˆå¿«ã€‚"; break; case "äº‘å—çœ": posdesc = "é£ç©¿è¿‡é«˜åŸï¼ŒèŠ±å¼€å¾—è‡ªç”±ã€‚"; break; case "é™•è¥¿çœ": posdesc = "åŸå¢™å¾ˆåšï¼Œå¤œè‰²å¾ˆé™ã€‚"; break; case "ç”˜è‚ƒçœ": posdesc = "ç¾Œç¬›ä½•é¡»æ€¨æ¨æŸ³ï¼Œæ˜¥é£ä¸åº¦ç‰é—¨å…³ã€‚"; break; case "é’æµ·çœ": posdesc = "æ¹–é¢å¦‚é•œï¼Œä¸–ç•Œå¾ˆå¤§ã€‚"; break; case "å°æ¹¾çœ": posdesc = "æˆ‘åœ¨è¿™å¤´ï¼Œå¤§é™†åœ¨é‚£å¤´ã€‚"; break; case "å†…è’™å¤è‡ªæ²»åŒº": posdesc = "å¤©è‹è‹ï¼Œé‡èŒ«èŒ«ï¼Œé£å¹è‰ä½è§ç‰›ç¾Šã€‚"; break; default: posdesc = "å¸¦æˆ‘å»ä½ çš„åŸå¸‚é€›é€›å§ï¼"; break; } break; default: posdesc = "å¸¦æˆ‘å»ä½ çš„å›½å®¶é€›é€›å§ã€‚"; break; } //æ ¹æ®æœ¬åœ°æ—¶é—´åˆ‡æ¢æ¬¢è¿è¯­ let timeChange; let date = new Date(); if (date.getHours() >= 5 && date.getHours() < 11) timeChange = "å¤©è‰²æ¸äº®ï¼Œä¸–ç•Œæ…¢æ…¢é†’æ¥ã€‚"; else if (date.getHours() >= 11 && date.getHours() < 13) timeChange = "é˜³å…‰æ­£å¥½ï¼Œæ—¶é—´ä¸å¿…å¤ªå¿«ã€‚"; else if (date.getHours() >= 13 && date.getHours() < 15) timeChange = "åˆåå¾ˆè½»ï¼Œæ€ç»ªæ­£æ•£å¼€ã€‚"; else if (date.getHours() >= 15 && date.getHours() < 16) timeChange = "æ—¶å…‰é™å¥½ï¼Œæ‚ ç„¶è‡ªå¾—ã€‚"; else if (date.getHours() >= 16 && date.getHours() < 19) timeChange = "é»„æ˜åœ¨é è¿‘ï¼Œé£å¼€å§‹å˜è½¯ã€‚"; else if (date.getHours() >= 19 && date.getHours() < 24) timeChange = "å¤œè‰²å·²æ·±ï¼Œç¯è¿˜äº®ç€ã€‚"; else timeChange = "å¤œæ·±äº†ï¼Œæ—©ç‚¹ä¼‘æ¯ï¼Œå°‘ç†¬å¤œã€‚"; try { //è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ–‡æœ¬å’Œéœ€è¦æ”¾çš„ä½ç½® document.getElementById("welcome-info").innerHTML = `
ğŸ‰ æ¬¢è¿ä¿¡æ¯ ğŸ‰
